backup_text:
eval $e in # evaluate the expressione e #
let sum : [Int] -> Int = 
fun xs -> 
case xs 
| [] => 0
| hd::tl => hd + sum(tl)
end 
in
pause sum($v) in #pause on the value of the expression #
sum([3,4,5])
